nodes.text: The Neutrino Angler was a model of racing vehicle which existed during the High Republic Era. In the aftermath of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, when Jedi Wayseeker Orla Jareni told Jedi Master and scholar Cohmac Vitus that ancient artifacts had been discovered aboard the Amaxine station they were stranded at, she did so in a tone of voice similar to what she might have used to inform a racing enthusiast about the presence of an Angler in a nearby hangar.
